name: SAS A320neo Trip Report, Economy: Stockholm-Arlanda to London Heathrow
description:

Date of Travel: 24 JULY 2017
Aircraft: Airbus A320
Tail: LN-RGN
Livery: SAS standard  
Route: ARN-LHR
Weather on Departure: Scattered clouds, winds calm 
Weather on Arrival: Scattered clouds, winds calm 
Airborne Time: 2h00
Miles: 738
Remarks: First time using LHR T2

Thanks for finding my video and pressing play! 

In this video, I take one of my favourite airlines - SAS - on a short flight between Stockholm in Sweden and London Heathrow. I really like SAS because they are very simple and efficient; you even scan your own bags and lounge entry is done by electronic gates. 

This was a beautiful day for flying. The Uppland area of Sweden is full of huge forests and agricultural land which is very photogenic from the air. 

SAS provides good value for money on European short haul and I definitely recommend them. 

Enjoy the report. 

Do you have any ideas for future trip reports? Something you've never seen on YouTube before? Why not suggest it to me in the comments? I read every single one! üëçüèª

Enjoy the video, and thanks for watching. If you subscribe, then thanks for being part of the channel!
